publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1918.1 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Powers over Casinos—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1918) in the name of Robert Brown, leave out from "consideration" to end and insert "Scotland should have the powers to make these decisions for itself, the same as in any other normal and independent country."
S2M-1918.1 Powers over Casinos (lodged on 2 November 2004) Fergus Ewing*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Richard Lochhead*

S2M-1918.1 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Powers over Casinos—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1918) in the name of Robert Brown, leave out from "consideration" to end and insert "Scotland should have the powers to make these decisions for itself, the same as in any other normal and independent country." Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Jim Mather, Rob Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Richard Lochhead
S2M-1918.1 Powers over Casinos (lodged on 2 November 2004) Linda Fabiani*
